Posts.EditableText: I would really like to center my small pictures (with "show picture" preferably, but only preferably). Can it be done? Can anyone help me with the script for it?

Posts.EditableText: Here's a bit of code from one of my games. You can probably work out what you need to change. I can't remember where I found this! ``` msg ("") ```
Posts.HTML:
Here's a bit of code from one of my games. You can probably work out what you need to change. I can't remember where I found this!

msg ("<img src='" + GetFileURL("movieposter.jpg") + "' style='display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width:300px;' />")
